meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neurologists help people with problems in their brain and nerves.
meanings.sent2: The neurologists at the hospital are very skilled at treating neurological conditions.
meanings.sent3: Why did the neurologists bring a brain to the party? To have a nerve-wracking time!
meanings.sent4: The neurologists are like detectives, solving mysteries of the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The neurologists' clinic is a hub of hope for those with neurological issues.

meanings.sent1: There are many neurologists working together in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The neurologists gathered for a conference to discuss new treatments.
meanings.sent3: The neurologists formed a band called 'The Brain Waves'!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of medical professionals, the neurologists stand out like a group of brain experts.
meanings.sent5: The neurologists' office is always buzzing with activity and brainpower.
